    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:38205</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>38205</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Gårdsfesten 4 - omkastade bokstäver</string>
            <string language="en">Farm Festival 4 - reversed letters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bauernhof-Festival 4 - aufgehobene Zeichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Festival 4 de ferme - lettres renversées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Festival 4 da fazenda - letras invertidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Festival 4 dell'azienda agricola - lettere 
invertite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγροτικό φεστιβάλ 4 - επιστολές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Festival 4 de la granja - cartas invertidas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Att hitta rätt ord när bokstäverna är omkastade är vad som tränas här. Övningen bygger på de tidigare lärobjekten med samma namn.Modul 4 - Hur bor du? - Hur bor de?Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Finding the right words when the letters are reversed is what trained here. The exercise builds on the previous learning objects with the same name. Module 4 - How do you live? - How do they live? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">bostäder</string>
            <string language="sv">Sverige</string>
            <string language="sv">fest</string>
            <string language="sv">inbjudan</string>
            <string language="sv">bostad</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">housing</string>
            <string language="en">Sweden</string>
            <string language="en">party</string>
            <string language="en">invitation</string>
            <string language="en">housing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Rechtwörter zu finden, wenn die Zeichen 
aufgehoben werden, ist was hier ausgebildet. Die Übung Bauten 
auf dem vorhergehenden Lernen wendet mit dem gleichen Namen ein. 
Modul 4 - Wie leben Sie? - wie leben sie? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est la conclusion des mots de droite quand les 
lettres sont renversées ce qui qualifié ici. Les constructions
d'exercice sur l'étude précédente objecte avec le même nom. 
Module 4 - Comment vivez-vous ? - comment vivent-ils
? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrar as palavras da direita quando as letras
são invertidas é o que treinado aqui. As configurações do 
exercício na aprendizagem precedente objetam com o mesmo nome. 
Módulo 4 - Como você vive? - como vivem? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'individuazione delle parole di destra quando le
lettere sono invertite è che cosa addestrato qui. Le 
configurazioni di esercitazione sull'imparare precedente obietta con 
lo stesso nome. Modulo 4 - Come vivete? - come 
vivono? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εύρεση των σωστών λέξεων όταν αντιστρέφονται οι 
επιστολές είναι τι εκπαίδευσε εδώ. Η άσκηση στηρίζεται στα
προηγούμενα αντικείμενα εκμάθησης με το ίδιο όνομα. 
Ενότητα 4 - πώς ζείτε; - Πώς ζουν; Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Es cuál encontrar las palabras de la derecha 
cuando se invierten las cartas entrenado aquí. Las estructuras 
del ejercicio en aprender anterior se oponen con el mismo nombre. 
Módulo 4 - ¿Cómo usted vive? ¿- cómo viven? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
